TI_TEXT.P: Услуги по планиране, създаване и разполагане на рекламата
Υπηρεσίες παροχής συμβουλών σε θέματα διαφήμισης
Serviços de consultoria em matéria de publicidade

ML_AA_NAMES.AA_NAME: EDF SA and ses filiales (C36, Cham, Citelum, Dalkia, Dunkerque LNG, Edelia, EDEV, EDF EN, EDF FM Services, EDF IM Solutions, EDF PEI, EDF Trading Logistics, Electricité de Strasbourg, Gaz Opale,GGF,GSS,Hydrostadium,Ifopse,Netseenergy,Protertia,Shema,Socodei,Sodetrel,Sofilo,Sofinel,Tiru,ZnR Batteries)

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: EDF SA and ses filiales (C36, Cham, Citelum, Dalkia, Dunkerque LNG, Edelia, EDEV, EDF EN, EDF FM Services, EDF IM Solutions, EDF PEI, EDF Trading Logistics, Electricité de Strasbourg, Gaz Opale,GGF,GSS,Hydrostadium,Ifopse,Netseenergy,Protertia,Shema,Socodei,Sodetrel,Sofilo,Sofinel,Tiru,ZnR Batteries)
ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.ADDRESS: Tour EDF, Direction des Achats Groupe, 20 Place de La Défense, La Défense 8

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY_ADDITIONAL.OFFICIALNAME: EDISON SpA and its subsidiaries: Edison Energia SpA, Edison Energy Solutions SpA and Fenice SpA
EDF Energy plc (including each and any subsidiary or holding company of EDF Energy plc and each and any subsidiary of a holding company of EDF Energy plc)

TITLE.P: Media buying services and Digital Ad Technologies

SHORT_DESCR.P: Supply of Media Strategy, Media buying services and Digital Ad Technologies (Adserving and ad-verification) in France, Belgium, Italy and the United-Kingdom, for EDF Group.

TITLE.P: Global media cover (360º media campaigns – Off and on line)

SHORT_DESCR.P: The services required include strategic advice in media choice and media buying in all types of media (national, local and international), including Paid digital. The requirements also include all types of advertising campaign (Corporate/Brand, BtoC, BtoB, Finance, Employer brand, sponsorship, ...) for EDF SA and its French affiliates which have given a mandate to EDF SA to act on their behalf, for EDF Energy and its affiliates, for EDISON and its affiliates, and finally for EDF Luminus.
The requirements above are needed for France, the United-Kingdom, Italy and Belgium.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: — 3 options of 1 year each to extend.
The duration mentioned in paragraph II.2.7 includes the options.

SHORT_DESCR.P: The services required by EDF SA and its French affiliates which have given a mandate to EDF SA to act on their behalf, for EDF Energy and its affiliates, for EDISON and its affiliates, and for EDF Luminus are as follows: purchase of a license for each software (such as rights to own and to use) and implementation of Adserver and ad-verification tools. This lot includes the following countries: France, the United-Kingdom, Italy and Belgium.

The Ad Serving technology shall store, manage, maintain, distribute and track the advertisements in desktop and mobile websites as well as applications. It shall allow EDF Group and/or its media agency to upload various ad creatives and to optimize the campaign by adding targeting parameters and additional functionalities (frequency capping, ad sequencing). It shall provide EDF Group with real-time statistical reports on impressions, clicks, post-click and post-impression activities and interaction metrics. It shall offer the option to directly contract with EDF Group with no intervention of EDF’s Media agency. It shall provide EDF Group with a self-service solution.

The Ad Verification technology should allow EDF Group to verify the quality of bought digital inventory, across all delivery channels by providing real-time information for each ad placement. It should have the capacity to measure Brand Safety (environment and context control), Viewability (actual displaying of the ad on the user’s screen), Fraud (non-human traffic), Audience (socio-demo profiles of users), Geographic targeting for Display and Video formats on desktop and mobile websites and applications. It shall offer the option to directly contract with EDF Group with no intervention of EDF’s Media agency. It shall provide EDF Group with a self-service solution.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: — 3 options of 1 year each to extend.
The duration mentioned in paragraph II.2.7 includes the options.

TITLE.P: Global media cover (360º media campaigns – Off and on line)

INFO_ADD.P: Candidates which would like to apply to this tender must load their application file on EDF electronic platform, at the following UR: https://pha.edf.com
To do so, please access the Request For Information NºRFx_034868.
For candidates who are not registered yet, please go to the homepage of the following website “https//pha.edf.com” and click on “New supplier? – Register Now”. (Free preliminary registration)

If necessary, an assistance on how to use the procurement portal can be obtained with IVALUA Clients Help Desk, which can be reached at by phone at +33 1 84 77 00 26 (price of a local call) from Monday to Friday from 08:00 am to 6:00 pm, or by mail at support-edf@ivalua.com
The tender documents will be sent through this EDF procurement Portal.
EDF will reserve the right to award the contract on the basis of initial offers without negotiation.
